thread.title: The highest paid sportsman ever after inflation makes Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi look poor as he earned £12.1BILLION during his career… but who is it?

author: dfraser
title: The highest paid sportsman ever after inflation makes Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi look poor as he earned £12.1BILLION during his career… but who is it?
text:
EFL A Roman Reigns The highest paid sportsman ever after inflation makes Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi look poor as he earned £12.1BILLION during his career… but who is it? 
Roman chariot racer Gaius Appuleius Diocles earned astonishing sum during a 24-year career, winning 1,462 events By Dave Fraser
